meanings.definition: To exist or occur before in time
meanings.sent1: The invention of the wheel predates the invention of the computer.
meanings.sent2: Dinosaurs predates humans by millions of years.
meanings.sent3: It's like the wheel predates the car!
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins predates written history.
meanings.sent5: The legend of Atlantis predates recorded civilization.

meanings.definition: To come before in order or position
meanings.sent1: The appetizer predates the main course in a meal.
meanings.sent2: The introduction predates the conclusion in a book.
